nodes.title: Luis' response of intimidation
nodes.description: I will be adding more as we go but need to get all of it chronological order, just know I have nothing to hide I am an open book!! Thank you for your support on this fight against injustices against families!!

embeddedMedia.description: Nikki(@like_i_aint) has created a short video on TikTok with music Warrior. #greenscreen #InLove #Homemade #happyathome #WhatILearned #rareaesthetic #Welcome2021 #MyRoutine #fyp #nativetiktoks #blm #vikings #scottishtiktok #in

nodes.title: Luis wants Child Support from both birth parents as a tactic
nodes.description: I received a letter in the mail, after I posted my petition here, from the child support enforcement services stating Luis opened a case for us to pay him child support. He makes over 100k a year, I make 25k a year and child support should be court ordered not taken upon by the plaintiff's own discretion. He is using this a tactic to abuse, harass me, torture our family and to manipulate the courts to his favor.
